com.epoch.substns

Class RGroupReplacer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.substns.RGroupReplacer

  • public final class RGroupReplacer
extends Object
    Replaces generic numbered R groups with the corresponding shortcut group.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean addHAtoms
      Whether to add explicit H atoms to the shortcut groups.
      private Molecule authorMol
      A Molecule that may contain generic numbered R groups.
      private Molecule[] rgMols
      Array of the shortcut groups to replace the generic R groups.

        Replace generic R groups in a molecule with shortcut groups. Modifies the molecule!

      • replaceRGroups

        boolean replaceRGroups(SelectionMolecule fragMol)
        Replace generic R groups in a selected fragment molecule within a Molecule with shortcut groups. Modifies the molecule!
        Parameters:
        fragMol - a selected fragment molecule within a Molecule
        Returns:
        true if there were generic R groups that were replaced

      • replaceRGroups

        private MovedAtoms replaceRGroups(MolAtom[] atomsToExamine)
        Replaces any generic numbered R groups among the atoms with a shortcut group. Modifies the molecule!
        Parameters:
        atomsToExamine - atoms of either a whole Molecule or a fragment molecule within a Molecule
        Returns:
        the atoms that are removed from or added to the molecule
